assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Basic functionality should return observerTarget ref and isFetching state
assertionResults.title: should return observerTarget ref and isFetching state

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Basic functionality should call onLoadMore when target intersects
assertionResults.title: should call onLoadMore when target intersects

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Basic functionality should not call onLoadMore when hasMore is false
assertionResults.title: should not call onLoadMore when hasMore is false

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Basic functionality should not call onLoadMore when isLoading is true
assertionResults.title: should not call onLoadMore when isLoading is true

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Basic functionality should reflect isLoading in isFetching
assertionResults.title: should reflect isLoading in isFetching

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Options should use custom threshold
assertionResults.title: should use custom threshold

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Options should use default threshold of 0.8
assertionResults.title: should use default threshold of 0.8

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Options should use custom rootMargin
assertionResults.title: should use custom rootMargin

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Options should use default rootMargin of 100px
assertionResults.title: should use default rootMargin of 100px

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Loading state management should set isFetching to true while loading
assertionResults.title: should set isFetching to true while loading

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Loading state management should not trigger multiple loads simultaneously
assertionResults.title: should not trigger multiple loads simultaneously

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Error handling should handle onLoadMore errors gracefully
assertionResults.title: should handle onLoadMore errors gracefully

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Error handling should allow retry after error
assertionResults.title: should allow retry after error

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Observer lifecycle should create observer when target is set
assertionResults.title: should create observer when target is set

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Observer lifecycle should cleanup observer on unmount
assertionResults.title: should cleanup observer on unmount

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Dynamic prop updates should respond to hasMore changes
assertionResults.title: should respond to hasMore changes

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Dynamic prop updates should respond to isLoading changes
assertionResults.title: should respond to isLoading changes

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Edge cases should handle null target gracefully
assertionResults.title: should handle null target gracefully

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Edge cases should handle non-intersecting entries
assertionResults.title: should handle non-intersecting entries

assertionResults.fullName: useInfiniteScroll Edge cases should handle rapid hasMore toggles
assertionResults.title: should handle rapid hasMore toggles
